nodes.body: khrus chog, byabs khrus, bkru byabs. Ex: Rnam ‘joms khrus kyi cho ga (W10568), Khrus lha lnga'i sgrub thabs bkru byab bsrung ba rjes gnang gi cho ga dang bcas pa dri ma kun sel (W27752), Sangs rgyas rab bdun gyi rig gtad byabs khrus bcas, Rnam 'joms mthing ar bsten pa'i byab bkrus kyi cho ga (W10844), Lhag pa'i lha gang rung gi sgo nas dad ldan la bkru byams [= byabs] bsrung gsum bya tshul (W3475).
